venue.name: KO Pub and Pies EAST BOSTON

item.description:
“The Rugby Championship” is the exciting and ground-breaking replacement for the Tri-Nations series, with Argentina confirmed alongside South Africa, New Zealand and Australia to contest this year's series.

Come and join us at the unofficial home of Aussie sports in Boston, KO Pub and Pies in East Boston, and support the Wallabies in their first game against the All Blacks. Afterwards we can catch a water taxi over to the Seaport District and head out for some drinks.

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: Rugby Championship: Wallabies vs All Blacks game 1 replay
